alert.note: Alert for Panola; Quitman; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 9:12PM CDT until April 27 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dubbs, or 18 miles west of Senatobia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Sardis, Como, Crenshaw, Sledge, Strayhorn, Pleasant Grove, Dubbs, Little Texas, Askew, Gerlach Mill, Looxahoma, Buxton, Savage, Crossroad, McGhee, Longtown, Tibbs, Sarah and Horatio. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
